languages.text: {n}Хейнрикс поводит слепыми глазами, силясь разглядеть вас.{/n} "Не может быть... {name}? Это действительно ты? Где ты? Рядом? Тогда, Троном заклинаю, найди способ вынуть меня из этого гроба".

{n}Heinrix's unseeing eyes move back and forth, struggling to see you.{/n} "It can't be... {name}... Is it really you? Where are you? Are you close by? Then, in the name of the Throne, find a way to get me out of this coffin."
languages.original_text: {n}Хейнрикс поводит слепыми глазами, силясь разглядеть вас.{/n} "Не может быть... {name}? Это действительно ты? Где ты? Рядом? Тогда, Троном заклинаю, найди способ вынуть меня из этого гроба".

traits.locale_text: {n}Heinrix's unseeing eyes move back and forth, struggling to see you.{/n} "It can't be... {name}? Is it really you? Where are you? Are you near? Then, in the name of the Throne, find a way to pull me out of this coffin."
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

traits.locale_text: {n}Heinrix's unseeing eyes move back and forth, struggling to see you.{/n} "It can't be... {name}? Is it really you? Where are you? Are you near? Then, in the name of the Throne, find a way to pull me out of this coffin."
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

traits.locale_text: {n}Heinrix's unseeing eyes move back and forth, struggling to spot you.{/n} "It can't be... {name}... Is it really you? Where are you? Are you near here? Then, in the name of the Throne, find a way to pull me out of this coffin."
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

traits.locale_text: {n}Heinrix's unseeing eyes move back and forth, struggling to spot you.{/n} "It can't be... {name}... Is it really you? Where are you? Are you near here? Then, in the name of the Throne, find a way to pull me out of this coffin."
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

traits.locale_text: {n}Heinrix's unseeing eyes move back and forth, struggling to see you.{/n} "It can't be... {name}... Is it really you? Where are you? Are you close by? Then, in the name of the Throne, find a way to get me out of this coffin."
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

traits.locale_text: {n}Heinrix's unseeing eyes move back and forth, struggling to see you.{/n} "It can't be... {name}... Is it really you? Where are you? Are you close by? Then, in the name of the Throne, find a way to get me out of this coffin."
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: {n}ハインリックスの見えない目は、あなたを見つけようと必死に行ったり来たりしている。{/n}「まさか…{name}…本当にあなたなのか？どこにいる？近くにいるのか？それならこの棺から私を解放する方法を見つけてくれ」
languages.original_text: {n}Heinrix's unseeing eyes move back and forth, struggling to see you.{/n} "It can't be... {name}... Is it really you? Where are you? Are you close by? Then, in the name of the Throne, find a way to get me out of this coffin."

traits.locale_text: {n}ハインリックスの見えない目は、あなたを見つけようと必死に行ったり来たりしている。{/n}「まさか…{name}…本当にあなたなのか？どこにいる？近くにいるのか？それならこの棺から私を解放する方法を見つけてくれ」
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: {n}海因里希瞎了的眼睛来回移动，努力想要看清你的样子。{/n}“这不可能……{name}……真的是你吗？你在哪里？就在我身边吗？如果是这样，黄金王座在上，想办法把我从这棺材里放出来吧。”
languages.original_text: {n}Heinrix's unseeing eyes move back and forth, struggling to see you.{/n} "It can't be... {name}... Is it really you? Where are you? Are you close by? Then, in the name of the Throne, find a way to get me out of this coffin."

traits.locale_text: {n}海因里希瞎了的眼睛来回移动，努力想要看清你的样子。{/n}“这不可能……{name}……真的是你吗？你在哪里？就在我身边吗？如果是这样，黄金王座在上，想办法把我从这棺材里放出来吧。”
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: {n}Los ojos ciegos de Heinrix se mueven de un lado a otro, tratando de verte.{/n} «No puede ser... {name}... ¿Realmente es usted? ¿Dónde está? ¿Está cerca? En nombre del Trono, encuentre una manera de sacarme de este ataúd».
languages.original_text: {n}Heinrix's unseeing eyes move back and forth, struggling to see you.{/n} "It can't be... {name}... Is it really you? Where are you? Are you close by? Then, in the name of the Throne, find a way to get me out of this coffin."

traits.locale_text: {n}Los ojos ciegos de Heinrix se mueven de un lado a otro, tratando de localizarte.{/n} «No puede ser... {name}... ¿Realmente es usted? ¿Dónde está? ¿Está cerca? En nombre del Trono, encuentre una manera de sacarme de este ataúd».
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: {n}Heinrixs blinde Augen bewegen sich hin und her, versuchen dich zu sehen.{/n} "Das kann nicht sein ... {name} ... Seid das wirklich Ihr? Wo seid Ihr? Seid Ihr in der Nähe? Dann findet im Namen des Throns einen Weg, mich aus diesem Sarg zu holen."
languages.original_text: {n}Heinrix's unseeing eyes move back and forth, struggling to see you.{/n} "It can't be... {name}... Is it really you? Where are you? Are you close by? Then, in the name of the Throne, find a way to get me out of this coffin."

traits.locale_text: {n}Heinrix' blinde Augen bewegen sich hin und her, versuchen dich zu finden.{/n} "Das kann nicht sein ... {name} ... Seid das wirklich Ihr? Wo seid Ihr? Seid Ihr in der Nähe? Dann findet im Namen des Throns einen Weg, mich aus diesem Sarg zu ziehen."
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: {n}Les yeux aveugles d'Heinrix font des va-et-vient sans pour autant parvenir à se poser sur vous.{/n} « C'est impossible... {name}... C'est bien vous ? Où êtes-vous ? Êtes-vous près de moi ? Dans ce cas, au nom du Trône, trouvez un moyen de me libérer de ce cercueil ! »
languages.original_text: {n}Heinrix's unseeing eyes move back and forth, struggling to see you.{/n} "It can't be... {name}... Is it really you? Where are you? Are you close by? Then, in the name of the Throne, find a way to get me out of this coffin."

traits.locale_text: {n}Les yeux aveugles d'Heinrix font des va-et-vient sans pour autant parvenir à se poser sur vous.{/n} « C'est impossible... {name}... C'est bien vous ? Où êtes-vous ? Êtes-vous près de moi ? Dans ce cas, au nom du Trône, trouvez un moyen de me libérer de ce cercueil ! »
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: {n}Heinrix'in kör gözleri, ileri geri hareket edip seni görmeye çalışıyor.{/n} "Mümkün değil... {name}... Gerçekten de sen misin? Neredesin? Yakında mısın? Taht aşkına beni bu tabuttan çıkarmanın bir yolunu bul."
languages.original_text: {n}Heinrix's unseeing eyes move back and forth, struggling to see you.{/n} "It can't be... {name}... Is it really you? Where are you? Are you close by? Then, in the name of the Throne, find a way to get me out of this coffin."

traits.locale_text: {n}Heinrix'in kör gözleri, ileri geri hareket edip seni görmeye çalışıyor.{/n} "Mümkün değil... {name}... Gerçekten de sen misin? Neredesin? Yakında mısın? O hâlde Taht aşkına beni bu tabuttan çıkarmanın bir yolunu bul."
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion
